title: Finance-related challenges for startups in India and how to overcome them? - Times of India
content: Finance-related challenges for startups in India and how to overcome them?  Times of India
description: In India, the trend of startups is growing by leaps and bounds. India has the third-largest startup ecosystem in the world, recording YoY annual growth of 12-15%. According to the Economic Survey 2021-22, there are...
